snippet.title: Operation Flashpoint: Red River - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
The stage is set for the newest Operation Flashpoint: Red River. Watch the debut trailer featuring gameplay and the story of the gritty military FPS.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
